newsitem.title: USA: Homestake, Navan in Bulgaria pact.
newsitem.headline: Homestake, Navan in Bulgaria pact.

text.p: Homestake Mining Co and Navan Resources Plc on Monday agreed to expand a Chelopech gold/copper mine and mill in Bulgaria for the joint exploration and possible development of Navan's exploration properties there.

The new arrangement, subject to completion of definitive agreements and approval by Navan shareholders, provides that Homestake will invest $30 million and provide a $10 million contingent standby loan facility for the Chelopech operation and make a $8 million investment in a new exploration joint venture.
Homestake owns 10 percent of Navan. The new deal provides for Homestake to earn up to a 51 percent interest in and have the right to become manager of the Chelopech operation.

The new pact also provides for Homestake to earn up to a 50 percent joint venture interest in Navan's existing Bulgarian exploration properties where Navan has already established a number of promising gold exploration targets.
